scripts.reset: rm -rfd ./node_modules/ && npm i && npm run deploy
scripts.//dev-link: Useful for debugging but don't commit it in this way; use `npm run dev-unlink` before committing. NOTE: Not using `npm link` or `npm add ../..` because that creates a filesystem symlink and serverless.com freaks out when attempting a deploy with a symlinked dependency.
scripts.dev-link: pushd . ; cd ../.. ; npm pack ; popd ; npm add ../../serverless-aws-static-file-handler-0.0.0.tgz
